name: CloudGuard Pro
description: Advanced cloud security suite with real-time threat detection, automated incident response, and compliance monitoring for multi-cloud environments.

name: DataSync Enterprise
description: Enterprise-grade data synchronization platform supporting 200+ connectors, real-time CDC, and schema evolution across hybrid infrastructure.

name: AI Assistant Hub
description: Centralized AI agent management platform with model routing, prompt versioning, usage analytics, and team collaboration tools.

name: DevOps Accelerator
description: CI/CD pipeline orchestrator with built-in testing frameworks, deployment strategies (blue-green, canary), and infrastructure-as-code templates.

name: ComplianceBot
description: Automated regulatory compliance checker supporting SOC 2, GDPR, HIPAA, and PCI-DSS frameworks with continuous monitoring and audit report generation.
